compiler
Interface Statement

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameCommand, IfElse, IfOnly, ReturnStatement, VariableAssignment, While
public interface Statement

A STATEMENT is an object that is nested inside of Blocks.

Author:
Michael Pinnegar

Method Summary
 void compile(TextFile flag)
          Creates the VMC representation of the intermediate tree structure.
 void print()
          Prints out the object's source code without comments or trailing whitespace.
 

Method Detail

print

void print()
Prints out the object's source code without comments or trailing whitespace. Useful for verifying the correctness of the intermediate tree structure.

Creates the VMC representation of the intermediate tree structure.

Parameters:
